name: The Stanford Occasional Table
description: A sophisticated design of Art Deco inspiration, the Stanford Occasional table is perfect for those who have a love for wood and fine detailing. Designed with a striking radial pattern to the tabletop and base, this smart occasional table draws the eye and holds your gaze with its impressive craftsmanship. Staying true to the DAVIDSON signature style, the Stanford has a clean and stylish outline with a circular top sitting on a smooth, tapered pedestal that stands on a circular base. The table can be made in any of DAVIDSON's timber finishes and standard sizes with feet in black lacquer instead of polished nickel for understated luxury.
